Message:
One day, I found
a beautiful red in town.

It was different from
the one I was looking for,
but I liked this one, too.

This beautiful red that
shined on the apples
at a nearby fruit stall.

“Ahh, I’m sorry, my dear,
but you don’t have
enough money.”

The stall owner
didn’t give me my red.

It’s my red, so why
doesn’t he give it to me...?
“He’s a bad man, isn’t he, Emma?”
